AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKShield01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oak grants a shield to a target, making them immune to damage for [GetBuffDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKShield02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oak grants a shield to a target, making them immune to damage for [GetBuffDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKShield03
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oak grants a shield to a target, making them immune to damage for [GetBuffDuration] seconds. This more powerful variant of Shield also removes debuffs.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKShield04
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oak grants a shield to a target, making them immune to damage [GetBuffDuration] seconds. Also, this powerful version of Shield removes debuffs and heals for [GetHealAmount].

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOakPurity
AbilityBlueprint.Description: When Oak uses Shield on an ally, all of his negative effects are removed, and he is immune to all negative effects for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKPenitence01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oak fills a target with holy remorse, dealing [GetDamage] damage, reducing their Movement Speed by [GetMoveSpeedPercent]% and increasing all damage taken by [GetDamageIncPercent]% for [GetBuffDuration] seconds.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HOAKPenitence01
BuffBlueprint.Description: Movement Speed reduced. All damage taken increased.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKPenitence02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oak fills a target with holy remorse, dealing [GetDamage] damage, reducing their Movement Speed by [GetMoveSpeedPercent]% and increasing all damage taken by [GetDamageIncPercent]% for [GetBuffDuration] seconds.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HOAKPenitence02
BuffBlueprint.Description: Movement Speed reduced. All damage taken increased.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKPenitence03
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oak fills a target with holy remorse, dealing [GetDamage] damage, reducing their Movement Speed by [GetMoveSpeedPercent]% and increasing all damage taken by [GetDamageIncPercent]% for [GetBuffDuration] seconds.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HOAKPenitence03
BuffBlueprint.Description: Movement Speed reduced. All damage taken increased.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKPenitence04
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oak fills a target with holy remorse, dealing [GetDamage] damage, reducing their Movement Speed by [GetMoveSpeedPercent]% and increasing all damage taken by [GetDamageIncPercent]% for [GetBuffDuration] seconds.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HOAKPenitence04
BuffBlueprint.Description: Movement Speed reduced. All damage taken increased.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKSurgeofFaith01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oak releases a wave of holy power, dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage to enemies. Increases allied unit Attack Speed by [GetAttackBuff]% and Movement Speed by [GetMovementBuff]% for [GetBuffDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKSurgeofFaith02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oak releases a wave of holy power, dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage to enemies. Increases allied unit Attack Speed by [GetAttackBuff]% and Movement Speed by [GetMovementBuff]% for [GetBuffDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKSurgeofFaith03
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oak releases a wave of holy power, dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage to enemies. Increases allied unit Attack Speed by [GetAttackBuff]% and Movement Speed by [GetMovementBuff]% for [GetBuffDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKRaiseDeadWard01
AbilityBlueprint.Description:
Oak places a ward that attracts the souls of the fallen. Units that are slain near the ward have a [GetSpiritChance]% chance to be converted to a spirit under Oak's control.

Oak can have [GetMaxSpirits] spirits active.

Oak can maintain [GetMaxWards] ward.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKRaiseDeadWard02
AbilityBlueprint.Description:
Oak places a ward that attracts the souls of the fallen. Units that are slain near the ward have a [GetSpiritChance]% chance to be converted to a spirit under Oak's control.

Oak can have [GetMaxSpirits] spirits active.

Oak can maintain [GetMaxWards] wards.

Spirits have +[GetMinionDamage] Weapon Damage and +[GetMinionHealth] Health.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKRaiseDeadWard03
AbilityBlueprint.Description:
Oak places a ward that attracts the souls of the fallen. Units that are slain near the ward have a [GetSpiritChance]% chance to be converted to a spirit under Oak's control.

Oak can have [GetMaxSpirits] spirits active.

Oak can maintain [GetMaxWards] wards.

Spirits have +[GetMinionDamage] Weapon Damage and +[GetMinionHealth] Health.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKRaiseDeadWard04
AbilityBlueprint.Description:
Oak places a ward that attracts the souls of the fallen. Units that are slain near the ward have a [GetSpiritChance]% chance to be converted to a spirit under Oak's control.

Oak can have [GetMaxSpirits] spirits active.

Oak can maintain [GetMaxWards] wards.

Spirits have +[GetMinionDamage] Weapon Damage and +[GetMinionHealth] Health.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOakSoulFrenzy
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oak has a [GetChance]% chance of inciting his Spirits into a berserker rage, increasing their attack speed by [GetAttackSpeedBuff]% and letting their attacks throw smaller units into the air. This effect lasts for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKLastStand01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: The spirit of Oak refuses to leave a battle unfinished. Should he fall, he will enter an invincible berserker fury, increasing his damage, move speed and Attack Speed by [GetBerserkPercent]% for [GetDuration] seconds before finally dying.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKLastStand02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: The spirit of Oak refuses to leave a battle unfinished. Should he fall, he will enter an invincible berserker fury, increasing his damage, move speed and Attack Speed by [GetBerserkPercent]% for [GetDuration] seconds before finally dying.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKDivineJustice01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: When Oak kills a target, he and his allies receive Health and Mana equal to [GetRegenPercent]% of the unit's maximum Health.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HOAKDivineJusticeSelf01
BuffBlueprint.Description: When Oak kills a target, he and his allies receive Health and Mana equal to [GetRegenPercent]% of the unit's maximum Health.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKDivineJustice02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: When Oak kills a target, he and his allies receive Health and Mana equal to [GetRegenPercent]% of the unit's maximum Health.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HOAKDivineJusticeSelf02
BuffBlueprint.Description: When Oak kills a target, he and his allies receive Health and Mana equal to [GetRegenPercent]% of the unit's maximum Health.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKDivineJustice03
AbilityBlueprint.Description: When Oak kills a target, he and his allies receive Health and Mana equal to [GetRegenPercent]% of the unit's maximum Health.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HOAKDivineJusticeSelf03
BuffBlueprint.Description: When Oak kills a target, he and his allies receive Health and Mana equal to [GetRegenPercent]% of the unit's maximum Health.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOakRally
AbilityBlueprint.Description: When Oak kills a Demigod, he and his allies receive +[GetArmor] Armor and heal [GetAmount] Health over [GetDuration] seconds.
AbilityBlueprint.GetAmount: function(self) return math.floor( Buffs['HOakRallyHeal'].Affects.Health.Add * Buffs['HOakRallyHeal'].Duration ) end

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKSoulPower01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oak's determination to his cause grows, increasing Weapon Damage by [GetDamageBoost]. Also, Oak gains additional Weapon Damage based on the number of spirits he has.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HOAKSoulPower02
